perturbation.original_text: Exhibit A to the Services Agreement shall be, and here by is, supplemented with the following: "3. Equity Trading and Transaction Settlement. The equity trading desks execute buy and sell order based on instructions provided by affiliated advisers. The trading staff either places orders electronically or contacts brokers to place orders, find liquidity and seek price levels. Upon completion of a transaction, the transaction settlement group works with the broker and the account custodian to ensure timely and accurate exchange of securities and monies.
perturbation.changed_text: Exhibit A to the Services Agreement shall be, and here by is, supplemented with the following: "3. Equity Trading and Transaction Settlement. The equity trading desks execute buy and sell order based on instructions provided by affiliated advisers. The trading staff either places orders electronically or contacts brokers to place orders, find liquidity and seek price levels. Upon completion of a transaction, the transaction settlement group works with the broker and the account custodian to ensure timely exchange of securities and monies. The transaction settlement group has 3 business days to complete the transaction. Failure to settle within 3 business days results in a 1% late settlement penalty based on the total transaction amount."
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction. Later in the contract, there are no late settlement penalties mentioned, so the 1% penalty after 3 business days is a contradiction. This creates uncertainty about enforcement regarding settlement deadlines.

perturbation.original_text: The Services Agreement, as amended by the Amendment and this Second Amendment with respect to Accounts for which the Adviser trades in equity securities, equity derivatives and other related equity investments as part of the investment strategy for the Account, shall remain in full force and effect.
perturbation.changed_text: The Services Agreement, as amended by the Amendment and this Second Amendment with respect to Accounts for which the Adviser trades in equity securities, equity derivatives and other related equity investments as part of the investment strategy for the Account, shall remain in full force and effect. However, all payment terms outlined in the original services agreement are superseded by a payment term that involves a 60 day payment schedule.
perturbation.explanation: This change adds a clause that all payment terms are superseded by a 60-day payment schedule. However, the original agreement could have payment terms that are less than 60 days, so this amendment introduces a contradiction. This can cause disagreements over payment terms

perturbation.original_text: Second Amendment may be executed in one or more counterparts, each of which will be deemed to be an original copy of this Second Amendment and all of which, when taken together, will be deemed to constitute one and the same agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: Second Amendment may be executed in one or more counterparts, each of which will be deemed to be an original copy of this Second Amendment and all of which, when taken together, will be deemed to constitute one and the same agreement. However, each counter part is only valid if all parties sign the same copy.
perturbation.explanation: This change adds that all parties must sign the same copy to validate it. The original text permits counterpart execution which means different parties can sign different copies. This introduces contradictory validation criteria, leading to uncertainties on what makes the agreement valid.
